v.v: I tell myself that I should praise Yahweh.
I tell myself that I should praise Yahweh
He forgives all my sins,
he keeps me from dying,
He gives me good things during my entire life.
Yahweh judges justly all those who have been treated unfairly.
Long ago he revealed to Moses what he planned to do;
Yahweh acts mercifully and kindly;
He will not keep rebuking us,
He has not punished us for our sins as we deserved.
The skies are very high above the earth,
He has taken away the guilt for our sins
Just as parents act mercifully toward their children,
He knows what our bodies are like;
We humans do not live forever;
but then the hot wind blows over them, and they disappear;
But Yahweh will faithfully keep loving forever
he will act that way to all those who obey the covenant he made with them to bless them if they did what he told them to do,
Yahweh has taken his seat in the heavens where he rules as king;
You angels who belong to Yahweh, praise him!
Praise Yahweh, you armies of angels who serve him and do what he desires.
All you things that Yahweh has created, praise him;

v: I will praise him because he is holy.
and never forget all the kind things he has done for me.
and he heals me from all my diseases;
and he blesses me by faithfully loving me and acting mercifully to me as he promised to do.
He makes me feel young and strong like eagles.
he showed to the ancestors of us Israelites the mighty things that he was able to do.
he does not quickly get angry when we sin;
he is always showing us that he faithfully loves us.
and he will not remain angry forever.
and Yahwehâ€™s faithful love for all those who revere him is just as great.
and put it as far from us as the east is from the west.
Yahweh is kind to those who revere him.
he remembers that he created us from dust
and that we therefore quickly fail to do what pleases him .
we are like grass which withers and dies.
We are like wild flowers that bloom for a short while;
no one sees them again.
all those who revere him, as he promised.
He will act fairly to our children and to their children;
to all those who obey what he has commanded.
from there he rules over everything.
You are powerful creatures who do what he tells you to do;
you obey what he commands.
praise him in every place where he rules, everywhere!
I also will praise Yahweh!
